00001 #include "QuadraticCurve.h"

00003 namespace jvgs
00004 {
00005     namespace math
00006     {
00007         QuadraticCurve::QuadraticCurve(const Vector2D &start,
00008                 const Vector2D &control, const Vector2D &end)
00009         {
00010             this->start = start;
00011             this->control = control;
00012             this->end = end;
00013 
00014             calculateLength();
00015         }
00016 
00017         QuadraticCurve::~QuadraticCurve()
00018         {
00019         }
00020 
00021         Vector2D QuadraticCurve::getPoint(float t) const
00022         {
00023             /* Create a line. */
00024             Vector2D v1 = start * (1.0f - t) + control * t,
00025                      v2 = control * (1.0f - t) + end * t;
00026 
00027             /* Find the point. */
00028             return v1 * (1.0f - t) + v2 * t;
00029         }
00030 
00031         float QuadraticCurve::getLengthGuess() const
00032         {
00033             return start.getDistance(control) + control.getDistance(end);
00034         }
00035     }
00036 }
